### Metered Sites - Click Blue Markers!
```{r message=FALSE}
load('/wildfire_spatial_data.Rdata')

library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)

leaflet(
  options = leafletOptions(
   minZoom = 6,
   preferCanvas = TRUE
  )
) %>%
  addProviderTiles(provider = "Esri.NatGeoWorldMap") %>%
  # addMarkers(
  #   data = site_coord,
  #   lng = ~long,
  #   lat = ~lat,
  #   popup = ~site_id
  # ) %>%
   addPolygons(
    data = poly_data_frame,
    popup = ~IncidentName,
    color = "red"
  ) %>%
  setView(
    lng = -121.904711,
    lat = 45.261010,
    zoom = 6
  )
```
